name: Josiah Sprague
body:
I am a talented front end web developer with a solid background in both Computer Science and Graphic Design. I'm currently looking for a remote position as a front end developer for great company.

##My Background
I grew up fascinated by computers. I got my start coding QBASIC at a DOS command prompt in my parent's basement. In 2001, I built my first web page, and I've been working on the web ever since. My college career was a varied and unique preparation for working on the web; I studied Computer Science for two years, and then graduated with a degree in Mass Media Communication and a minor that includes Graphic Design and Animation. My professional background has been focused on front end web development, and has been rounded out with some experience in back end programming, design, project management, marketing and SEO.

##Notable Projects
* Quotable for WordPress
* Bilingual Website for Doulos Discovery School
* Delta Agent Sites
* More...

##Refined Skills
While I don't limit myself to this skill set, here are some of the skills I've spent a significant amount of time refining;
* WordPress Development
* HTML, XML, Microdata
* CSS, LESS, SASS
* JavaScript
* PHP
* Responsive Web Design
* SEO, Google Analytics

##More Information
* [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com/in/josiahsprague)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/jrswp)
* [Code Blog]()
* [Personal Blog](http://josiahsprague.com)
